titleInfo.title: Fitzpatrick, Morgan, Nashville, Tennessee to Hon. Jas. B. Frazier, Chattanooga, Tennessee

mods.note: Letter dated September 11, 1900 from Morgan Fitzpatrick of the State Democratic Executive Committee in Nashville, Tennessee to Hon. James B. Frazier in Chattanooga, Tennessee that states that while Frazier may be qualified to run for Elector, Frazier should refer to the eclosed "Qualifications of an Elector" to make sure.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
